column2: Text
The offence must be sated - and only then shall I take up Sunfang to fight the true enemies of the Phoenix Throne!
This is a sad day for Ulthuan, when Asur fights Asur within sight of the White Tower.
Bel-Korhadris would surely weep, as I will for the dead that I slay this day.
But make no mistake, I will reap a toll, for my honour has been called into question.
Slay them them all! Bring me Alcadizaar's remains! My Tomb Blade will burn with the light of Nagash!
Their pitiful knowledge of such matters will die with them, here before the statues of the gods!
This pathetic rabble of reptiles presume to master the arts of resurrection!
Come, loyal thralls! Today, we do Nagash's work.
Hahaha! Very cleva! I like it! Surround us on yer nags… Immortulz ta me. I’m gonna kill dis Chaos Lord; smash iz ‘elmet off and pulp iz ‘ead with it - we’re gonna ‘ave right laff!
I'm 'da Greatest' not som stinking goblin-lovin' git called Rotgut! Immortulz ta me - let'z get ‘em!!!
Right, yoo gitz! Fink you can hide from me in dere! Dis fortress iz now mine!
Cutlasses out! Blood and salt!
No, my real sire… the Seafather! Let the forces of the false begetter crash uselessly against the cliffs, like waves against the Swordfysh's hull!
My father calls, not this Norse puppet who claims ownership simply because he spilt his seed…

To the ‘champion’ in my armour… Yes, you may have heard of me. I am Sigvald the Magnificent, the Geld-Prince of Slaanesh. I do not blame you if hearing my name has caused you to void your bowels. Just make sure the Auric Armour is clean when I come to take it.
It is only right I take it from him, and if you, my serfs, die in agony during the attempt, then know that I'll feel your pain… why, I will relish it!
Ah, my loyal minions. Over the way stands something I want… I need. Beatific mail, wasted on the clueless worm who wears it.
No Matter! I could do with a workout - but do not over-vex me or your death-cry will be especially shrill and I do hate to taint my ears with such cacophonic nonsense if I can bear it.
You could hand it straight over, of course, but I have seen your kind before. You will be irksome and make me fight for it.
and he'll be the first royal meal for the new king of the world - me! Monsters and madmen all - let’s have their guts for lunch!
Doesn’t the stupid little man know he steals from royalty? When I catch him, I’m taking my crown back,
Gaaaah! Beardy man over there has my crown! Stunty-runt dares steal from me!
Look at that despicable cabal of Eagle-God worshippers across the way, with their craven Champion! I fear no Champion, I only destroy them!
And you, the warriors and twisted beasts of my army, have slain many with me in the name of our Dark Master.
Make no mistake - he still watches us!
May the bodies continue to fall! May their limbs be torn from their torsos! May the battlefield be soaked red with their blood!!!
It is a great deed we must do today. The twisted things of Chaos have come to our shores in vast numbers.  Many were dashed upon the rocks, yet enough remain to pose a terrible threat.
Should they win this day, Bretonnia will be nought but ruins. But hope endures; take solace in the Lady’s shining grace - for victory!
Malice seeps from their every pore and breath - they are the very essence of doom.
Vermin! Green-skinned filth with base blood pumping through their crude veins! They serve no purpose, they are poor minions, even in death!
I have always despised Bretonnia - a land ruled by some pitiful witch the smallfolk dare to call a god.
I would have this land for mine studies. And yet I am pestered by these filthy creatures.
Only I can bring the night - the flower of Bretonnia shall wither and the tomb that holds mine prize be broken open and those inside shall serve me!
I shall play the role of exterminator - wipe these Orcs out.
They shall know a true deity! I am a god, let thy grave-bound and thy living worship me - Mannfred the wise; Mannfred the Unliving, Mannfred the Merciless!
A strange smell in the air… poison?
The Crow uses cheap tricks, but they won’t work on me! Today I dine on his puppets!
Gaaah! Another petty challenge! If the Crow-God wants a fight with me, I give him a fight!
Here is a maggot to make an example of! It will be a warning to all the Chieftains of the North.
I will teach him a bitter lesson - one for all who defy me, who dare to oppose the will of the Chaos Gods!
This fool dares challenge me?! He thinks I care about his trivial lust for power?
Now, my followers, let us attend this tiresomeness - by dusk I wish to be swilling the maggot’s blood in his upturned skull, while channelling his ravaged spirit into Morkar’s armour!
Now the tidal wave of blood we've spilt has drawn the attention of the Hound’s twisted followers. They stand across the way with their weakling Champion,
attempting to summon yet more cretins. I will take his skull, and together we will wipe out every one of them! To the slaughter!!!
The bodies of enemies slain have paved a bloody path, drenched in gore, by the will of our master; the trail has led us here today!
Do as I bid - Clan Pestilens supreme!
Quick-quick, get my book!
Only Liber Bubonicus matters. First get-get these corpses out of my way! Kill-slay zombie summoners!
Ignore the Dead-things. Fight them. Kill or be killed; does not matter!
The Black Pyramid rises. It is time for the Great King to ascend to a new throne.
Forward my legions, I will have Nagash’s pyramid – Settra dominates ALL!
But Arkhan attempts to frustrate me, proving finally that blind loyalty to a perished conjurer will be his doom.
Then we shall slay them all bar one. I will look in the eye of this last surviving foe and he will not bear falsehood. He will tell me how to lift the curse on Avelorn's star.
Now, away, my host! Begin the toil!
Silence, my sisters! We work covertly. As Isha looks from upon high so shall we look down on these mortal puppets by taking the higher ground.
But before then, I’ll have to be crass and make these unfortunate souls stare at my looking glass.
Ahhhhhhhhhhhhh… what joy do these gleaming spear-wielders bring, for now there is a chance for me to sing, and then they shall escort to their seafaring king…
This is my edict as High King! Khazukan Kazakit-ha!
Destroy these monsters, bring them down like rotten elgi trees, so we may raid their filthy lairs and reclaim lost heirlooms that belong in Karaz-a-Karak!
These creatures are descendants of those perpetrators and the debt stands with them.

To the rest of the throng: I have studied the pages of the Dammaz Kron and found many, many entries of Trolls, Giants and other fell things attacking Dwarfen families, stealing our treasures, and destroying our holds!
To the Slayers, I say, chant your battle-hymns of doom, fulfil your oaths and seek glory in death!
It is time for a cull, my kin, the creatures of Troll Country are nowt but a nuisance - a menace to be laid low!
Our Goddess has spoken to me! She who prepares the hearth; who secures our Holds.
Well, I see you, scum, and by Valaya's cloak I'll have every last rotten one of you back in that ground, pushing up your tombstones!
Uzkular have been caught sneaking about like rat-men filth, trying to gain access to our mountains unseen.
Wassat? Yez, we'll go south afterwards.
Let'z go an' kill some Knights!
Then, the rest of Bretonnia! My Masters will receive these offerings by my sword! Kill at will!!!
Pompous and proud, yet they don’t even give me the courtesy of a worthy fight. I come here seeking Champions, but look – they send peasants!
Their cowardly Lords don’t deserve their riches, so we shall kill them and take all that we see.
Tribesmen, again it is time to soak our blades in the blood of weak southerners!
Puny Elf! Uncloven. Unknowing. Ignorant.
They will regret. Morghur will change them; ruin them.
They take from me what is mine - weapon. Power!
They will know our power, MY power! Raaarrr!
Anchor the tides and slow the moons,

column1: break the waves and tame the sea!
column2: true
The monster hunts and the prey will shiver,
true
The beast cares not if you're living or dead,

column1: into its belly is where you'll head!
column2: true

Graktar is lame… grrr… his time is over! Put him in ground, let him feed worms! Now is the time of Khazrak! They call me cunning, they call me the One-Eye - I call me Beastlord of all! RRRRRRAAAAARRRR!!!!
I care not for this Pyramid. Unlike others, it is not power I seek, but vengeance.
This is a tool, nothing more. It is a gift to Asaph, and in her name I shall hunt the whores of Lahmia!
So, my legions, banish this Liche King, he is in our way!
Dose Stoopid flouncy humies fink they can trounce all over our sacred ground. Dat burial mound iz Mork's property not some fishy-smellin lake-hag's...
Bloomin 'at, stop whisperin' at me, I know!

Come on ladz, we're gonna stamp these gits and send them runnin' back to their pretty towers. I've 'ad my vision from Mork 'imself. He reckons if we doo this, it's gonna sort my armour out real good and I won't 'ave to knock you all about.
Purge this swamp.
Drain it of filth, of the warm-blood’s presence.
The way must be purged, so I can approach the revered Old One.
Do this quickly, time marches against us!
Now they hide behind a glyph-enchanted tower. I must reconnect with my powers… I must silence the voices in my head!
Forward, deckhands! Bring me that Slann Gold, or I’ll send you back to your watery graves!
That mob of reptilian scoundrels travelled far for their precious gold… it must be important…
What are they hiding? What secrets does it contain? The Winds of Magic have shunned me for too long, my thoughts constantly at odds with one another.
All the while, those bulbous Slann toad-priests conjure great spells for their futile causes.
Mine puppets, do me this deed. Purge the area of insects so thy master can collect this Warpstone unchallenged.
They were halcyon days - when my minions hunted wyrdstone and the Empire was in ruins, as it will be again...
If mine memory serves, I sought out such material in Mordheim some centuries ago.
Fetch me the head of this Strigoi - I would have this nuisance quashed!
Send for the sword - summon Sliverslash!
Sickly, sinful, spectacles stand, shuffle, shamble and saunter shamelessly in mine scandalized sight! I suggest a solution...
Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald - the salacious, scandalous and sensational servant of Slaanesh! Son of Succubi, scion of sordid acts and slayer of squalid serfs!

See how I stroll, stride, swagger and swirl, spin, slash and stab at stupid, senseless scum! Soon they shall swoon, shall seek solace and death from sundry torments wrought on them by my strategic, severing, scintillating shower of shimmering strikes!
But cunning is this vermin, yes-yes. I will have to be wary. Make sure Clanrats set off the traps - better they die than me-me!
Scurry-forward now-now, begin-fight! Kill-kill!
Says his armour is more special than mine does he-he! Then I will take-steal it! I am Queek! The best stuff shall be mine.
I am risen to protect the Deepwood. Undead have no place on this earth, no place in my forest.
All has happened before. All will happen again. Suffering is unending - battle, eternal.
I am ancient. Eternal. Vengeful. I am Durthu!
Return to me the battle-gift of Daith that I might enact wrath upon the world!
Those who defile the land will face my fury. There will be no reprieve;
The only answer is in kind; I will rise and smite the Undead outsiders.
March on, brave Dawi, march on!
So let us not dawdle, for there are grudges to settle and new entries in the Dammaz Kron to write!
To the cursed realms of the grobi we go. I know not what mischief they cause, but they are up to something for my beard itches with trouble!

Are you with me, Men of the Empire? For when the Northmen come, they will attack hard as their despicable Gods demand. We must be ready to push them back, thrust them into the sea in defence of the Empire!

The Celestial Wizards read the portents true. Norse Raiders land on Nordland’s shores. We have marched many miles, but there is no distance so great that I would not gladly march it to face this - our ultimate foe!

I have refused the honour of wielding the blade of our forebears thus far. I was not worthy. But should we survive this day, should we drive the ruinous tribes back across the sea - then, with your blessing - I will pick up the Reikland Runefang and use it to bleed our foes - to carve my way through Sigmar's enemies!
Hear me now, brave men - brave Reiklanders - hear me!
We take the Underway, these ancient highways built by Dwarf hands give us the best chance of approaching swiftly - catching the Greenskins unawares…
This naive and foolish Glade Lord has allowed his mind to be poisoned by the Prince of Pleasure.
The Dreaming Woods are a forbidden place of great malice and deception, and in his folly our erstwhile brother has been twisted by the dark deeds within.
There can be no further mercy. As I am born from Kurnous' spirit, so shall these dark servants be purged by it.
Let them face the rage of the forest!
Settra sends all Nehekhara against us, but with your staff in hand they are doomed to fail!
I do not claim this, I am merely its steward; a warden to keep your shrine ready for your inevitable resurrection
A necessary task, for even now the feeble Tomb Kings gather to steal your majesty!
My master, your Black Pyramid is ready.
So, my crew, dispose of this vermin and their god. For riches and murder await!
Let Malekith have it, for he has promised me Ulthuan’s coasts!
And when they sink, I have been commissioned to collect and enslave all Asur hiding in their precious colonies. The spoils and infamy will be legendary!
The Vortex lies at the heart of Ulthuan. It interests me little.
Perhaps he cowers on his Black Ark?
They say he is scared of me - that he worries about a prophecy that foretells his doom by a magic-wielder of male aspect.
I see the Witch King’s armies, but not Malekith himself!
For Lileath, for the Phoenix Throne, for Ulthuan!
Do not show these fallen-kin mercy for they have never shown us any…
I have seen it, my herd-kin!
The Dark Masters, show me the way. Tear down their walls, burn their churches…
Defile this river with man-filth bodies!
Please me - your Crowfather - and let the Dark Omen spread!
Then the mist and shadows will form around me - a cloak formed of the stuff of night!
That’s right - slay the Goblins, my wondrous Wights, my warriors of bone, my monsters of necrotic flesh - do my bidding, release them of life!
Oh dear me, oh no, we can’t have this, can we?
What a to do - we shall have to sort this mess out! Punish these creatures, oh yes, make them think twice about trespassing on the barrows of the dead!
The treasures in that tomb - the spirit-essence that was once Marbad of the Endals - is mine to harvest, not for these impudent Goblins to worship.
Not long, my brothers. Soon I shall have the missing pages and with the Liber Noctus complete I can begin your true resurrection!
Now, go my minions - onwards! Take these living fools by surprise. I'll have that casket and the pages within!
Mannfred may have set this task as a test, but I fear no challenge.

For we know she is a puppet, her strings pulled by that cursed wretch, von Carstein! Now, men, chase her down. Return to me what is mine and send these von Carstein beasts a message… by taking her head!
The Witch Hunters bring word that a Vampire crone makes haste for Stirland with the Silver Seal in her clutches! I charge you brave men with not letting that Vampiress get to Sylvania!
We hunt this day! Yet our quarry is neither boar nor deer; no, we pursue the Undead!
By order of the Grand Theogonist - show no mercy!

We have brought her to bay at the centre of a forsaken temple, syphoning off ill magicks to power her dread spells, have no doubt! Surround the crone - slay the creature before she can summon her minions.
The warmbloods trespass...
Their magic-users dare to activate the stellar engine at centre... Ignorance!
Fallen Gates not for them.
Attack now! Destroy and rend, so declares Lord of Solar-City!
Forwards - cross the bridge! I must see trespassers punished!
Come them, Changer, bring your best! I will prove once more that I am the Everchosen…
For I am the Anointed, the Bringer of Woes - the one, true, LORD OF CHAOS!
Even as this Daemon-spawn plots to overthrow me, I know my destiny is absolute. Bel’lakor will coronate me!
Take them now!
Let their puny wolf god know that it is the One-Eye who slaughters his pack!
Bathe in their blood – feast on their guts – gnaw on their bones!

We face the trespassers deep in the Bloodpines - keep your wits, lads, for there is more than Ulric’s dogs in there… My father had to send the Reiksguard in to purge these woods of Forest Goblin filth more than once during his reign.
Yet that is not what we face today. No, today we send the Elector Count of Middenland a message that it is the House of Franz that protects the borders of Reikland!
Come, men - it seems Todbringer sends his Midden wolves across the Reik to test our mettle!
He seems to think that since my father’s death Reikland is weak and we cower under our beds waiting for these Ulric-worshippers to save us from our woes!
I say, we Reiklanders are more than capable of defending ourselves - I say, we show Todbringer’s mongrels that Reiklander blood flows through our veins!
The beast is summoned, your use is at an end!
Prepare to face the Krakenlord!
It has been amusing watching your sea-wracked corpses stumble and dodder as you tracked the prey, but Amanar is Lothern’s guardian, a creature aligned to the Asur.
Who are you to interfere in such an ancient rivalry? The prize is mine and mine alone!
Your hunt is over. The Merwyrm is not yours to slay. It is a creature of Mathlann, Lord of the Deeps, and only I am charged to cull in His name.
Fall upon them as the howling winds fall upon the winter leaves - show them that nothing can stand before the fury of the storm!
Their auras cannot protect them now, for I am charged with the spirit of Kurnous; rage and destruction flow through me!
These beasts call themselves 'hunters'? Hah! Do they not know they face Orion, Master of the Wild Hunt?
So, let us record great deeds this day, and give these urki scum a right royal hammerin'!
At last, we have lured the Orcs to the place we Dawi fight best - in Grungni's realm!
I see beside me brave Dwarfen hearts. Such courage will imbue my Rune Helm. This is a day to strike many grudges from the great book,
for I am the White Dwarf and only worthy folk appear in my pages...
Mmm slave of the Hound God is here for a fight! The fool tries to make prey out of a predator! Does he know he fights a king?
Not like the weak man-kings of the south. I eat those kings for breakfast! Time to feast!!!
Whatever this power is, I shall have it, and I shall use it to ascend the von Carsteins to ever-greater magnificence!
Yet they have attracted the attention of the ignorant Empire. Clearly, they possess some power beyond that of their brutish ilk.
I might find them beautiful if they weren't so terribly disgusting.
There is such wonder in the raw, unbridled fury of these Beastmen; they teem and fester with might.
I 'ope yer 'ungry, Gobbla!
Patience, Gobbla, soon you'll eat, and itz yer favourite - stunty-meat!
So predickable, dese stunties act like clockworkz. I bet I could work out when Ironhammer or Grudgebearer comb deir beardz if I wanted...
Well 'ere dey come now, and dey are all tool'd up ready to fight. Get ready boyz!
If I see any of yoo runnin' da wrong way... well Gobbla 'ere iz' 'ungry - ee's alwayz 'ungry!
Oi, you lot, I sed stay 'idden - we want to surprise the bearded gits, make 'em soil deir breeches when we jump out an' shout "Gotcha!"
So, 'ere's da plan, take 'em in da front and in da sidez. I want da way clear'd so I can get my new prodder! Geddit?
Such a paradise! Unblemished. Pure. It must be gifted the touch-touch of Pestilens!
Lead me to the Crimson Skull so I make it powder and restore my Rod of Corruption, yes-yes!
That the Reptile-things attack me-me for this is blasphemy!
Let us begin - yes-yes!
Dwarf-things! Look how they scurry to us on such little legs! Racing to fight-fight!
No other rat must slay more than me-me. Any who attempt to out-kill me-me will pay!
We will give them battle, yes-yes! I’ll take back Gouger, and collect many beards this day-day!
Get them! Get them now-now!
Are you with me, lads?!
I wish to cleanse myself in battle, once I have cleaned my soul of the subterfuge then I will wear the honourable Cloak of Fyrskar again!
Now, my throng, ready your shield walls, bring the oath stones, let us dreng all before us! When the job is done I will crack open a barrel of Bugman’s and we will drink until none can stand!
At last! Enough of this larking about, lads. It is time to arm ourselves, to act like Slayers and bring death to the urks - and especially those snivelling grobi!
And then the whole world will burn before I rest again - such is my rage - this is the new pact I make to the Dark Powers!  Raaaaargh!
I will smash all that remains of these ruins to powder and not stop until my hammer is found.
The green things and Unliving alike will bear witness to my wrath! They are mine to dismember, to disembowel, to crush!
Steady, my Corsairs, the Skaven come - they think to board my tower in secret, but no creature steps upon the Blessed Dread without my knowing.
Be merciless! The Kraken rumbles. My helm thirsts for the power it lacks, and these vermin filth will quench it.
The rodent-sorcerer sends his minions, but this is no sinking ship. No rats are welcome here!
We will not yield to these curs, no! We will plunge our blades into their ignoble hearts and reclaim our birthright!
Much like the sea crashing against the shore, we will crush these traitors. Now, with me, Companions; for Bordeleaux!
My friends; we are blighted by savage deception from those we once thought of as brothers! They have stolen the artefacts from beneath us and now they mock our righteous fury!
See craven men! See them limp together like scared cattle.
Kill for me, kill for dark masters, kill! That is why we were born! KILL!
They run no more; now is slaughter! Now we end lake hag's mongrels; now we end Sigmar's weak sons.
You and your followers will die - that is my oath, as my kin, Grimnir, is witness!
Those scales are from my armour and no thief steals from the White Dwarf and lives.
I would have words with your little beast face-to-face, so that I may lop off its claw and reclaim what is mine.
Wazzock! You slime-worshippin' umgi filth-merchant! Get your arse and that pet reptile over here!
Anyway! Let’s give Gork a show.  - get smashin! I want dis pass filled with blood, I want da Humies to remember my name for yearz and yearz… remember GRIMGOR!!!
Raaaaargh! Dis iz it, Boyz! Time to give dis ‘Empera’ a right spankin’! Me and da Immortulz will lead from da front and seek out da poncey crown-wearin’ git ridin' on 'iz big pigeon!
Any 'oo fink they're gonna keep it instead, well... you'll find my boot so far up yer arse, you'll be tasting squig-leather until yoo die - which will be straight after!
My axe, Gitsnik, is somewhere in dat pass. A bag of teef to the Orc dat finds it and 'ands it over.
...dey nicked it and I want it back!
Go and kill da git and all 'iz mates. And get my mask back off 'im...
Dis false prophet don't talk to da Green Godz. I should know cos dey told me, dey don't like 'im! Ee smellz right funny. 'Ee got some crazy funk about 'im alright.
For too long the Mortuary Cult has fallen into the Arch-Necromancer’s shadow.
But Nagash has gone from this world, and if we claim the Black Pyramid we will ensure he can never return!
The lore within shall show us the true path to the Day of Awakening – now is the dawn of the Mortuary Cult!
Yes, yes! Banish the Liche King – we are exiles no longer!
The Cult of Ulric has defamed us! The Midden-Wolves should be our allies, for was Sigmar not a worshipper of Ulric during his mortal span?
So confident am I in these new machines that I forsake my axe, and will not take it up again until victory is secured here.
I do this in the knowledge that those Orcs will soon be corpses scattering the battlefield. Let us be about this!
I will have no more of this foolishness! Slay this representative of the Ar-Ulric, let that be chastisement enough, and then - if Sigmar permits - we may become brothers-in-arms once more.
Now let us test them against the eternal enemy - the ones who have more entries in the Great Book of Grudges than any other - the Orcs!
Instead they work against us, weakening the Empire that our sovereign lord, Emperor Karl Franz, has laboured so hard to unite under the Twin-Tailed Comet's glowing aspect.
See how the Greenskin filth flock around that vile pillar! Let us wipe them out!
New flying Gyro-machines will take to the air!
Now we must fight this sorry battle, not for my honour but for that of Sigmar himself! To war!
Let me assure my traditionalist brethren within the Guild that Morgrim himself would be pleased with this innovation.
Behold, the stone-fruits of the Engineers' Guild's labour!
but he’ll never have enough to defeat the Troll King! He summons them only for us to kill, for me to eat!
will use the Vortex as a portal and take form on this plane of reality.
They will all know I am the Lord of the Monster Horde!
This is abhorrent to the concepts of the Great Plan.
Gangly fool over there is Champion of the Eagle-God. Look at him panic! He tries to summon more of the Eagle’s puppets,
The collective consciousness of the Rat-spawn, which they believe a god,
The Skaven were nothing more than a cosmic accident - they should not exist.
Right this wrong, by my will!
A decision has been made then, oh yes, slay the Chaos dogs - oust them for Kemmler, my pretties!

A blade of great power, I’ll warrant! Should I let these blind fools have the spoils? I think not, I think they should make way for the Lichemaster, and if such an act angers their Dark Gods? Well, there are pacts to be made, secrets to share, and covenants to be sworn, I’m sure.
I see… I see…
And what other treasures are buried with the champion? What wondrous antiquities have been lost to the world?

These servants of the Ruinous Powers search for something… or someone. Oh, how delightful - could Krell be down there? If I could right what Grimbul Ironhelm did wrong and return Krell to Unlife, well, that would be a feat wouldn’t it?
These Chaos dredges bore me. At least with the Asur I can enjoy their death screams. Yet it is a labour that must be undertaken.
I claim this altar, not in Khaine’s name, but mine own.
Savants of the desperate Gods, I advise you stay out of my way,
If not, you shall face the might of the Druchii, and our ways of killing are far more inventive than your own!
Hear me Khaine, I dedicate all the following deaths to you. Give me your bloody hand so I may hold it and let it guide me to victory!
My retainers advise caution, but I am no coward... The first slash is the sweetest and I always strike first!
Our victories prove the Master’s dominance! Now we will show them what a threat we really are – we shall drown them in their own blood and guts! Glory to the Master!!!
We have shunned their God, and for that they consider us a threat - and so they should!
What a compliment! Although the other Ruinous Ones show us no favour, they at least grant us recognition! The followers of the Crow dare stand before us as an affront to our Master.
May this please you, mighty Ptra, bringer of the day, for it is the last these unbelievers will ever see!
Today, I offer him a fine tribute indeed - a thousand souls or more, each an idolater, a heathen, and an enemy of Nehekhara.
I alone may wield the Blessed Blade of Ptra. For am I not his right-hand, the Bringer of the Fires of the Sun?
For the good of the Empire, I will rise to the highest magical office in the land, and this fool will not stop me!
Now, men, fight - bring me victory. The Emperor needs me, not some pathetic Pyromancer or insipid white wizard!
Men of the Empire! I am no Warrior Priest blessed with the gift of making grand speeches, I am no orator - that is true. But I am not a cold man despite this mask, frozen in its stern aspect.
If Orr thinks he can take what is rightfully mine then he is very much mistaken!

The Wind of Chamon will rise and blast any who get in my way! Now is the time for the Gold Order and I will brook no interference, any who get in my way will see their armour run into lead goblets, their blades melt and their bones turned to gold!

What we do this day, is not just some plot to gain favour for the mantle of Supreme Patriarch… No… There is much more at risk, if the Mountain God awakes, if Sun-Eater is roused from his ancient slumber all that we hold precious is doomed. We must stop the summoning and stop it now!
I will be Supreme Patriarch - I will wield the Staff of Volans!
I ain’t talkin’ for talkin’s sake. My time’s better spent killin’ stunties.
Those Chaos men, ‘ave got some shiny stuff. Fink they can keep it from us?!

If yoo want ta come and kill som stunties too - then come. But don’t be getting’ in my or da immortulz way. I don’t care ‘oo’s under my choppa, and if it’s your skull instead of a stoopid stunty, I’ll laff just as ‘ard!
Dese Chaos-gitz are meant to be ‘ard… dey got squiffy Godz that will turn ‘em into gribbly monsterz if dey’re not!
Come on then, let's go and scalp stunty beards! Grrrraaaasagh!
So we’re gonna ‘ave a good scrap, da northern humies better not disappoint!
Wot’s more - they’re haulin’ a load of shiny stuff back from the big-hatted Stunties. They fink they can keep it from uz, I wantz it all! Go get ‘em, ladz!
Even now a throng from Karak Azul approaches the green-filth from the rear.
We are honoured to dreng the Orcs from the front - let them face our might, let them see what Dawi of the Angrund Clan are made of!
Yes, my kin, today is a great day! Today we kill urks! Today is vengeance!
RRRRRRAAAARRRRR! Take them now! Bathe in their blood – feast on their guts – gnaw on their bones! Let their puny wolf god know that it is the One-Eye who slaughters his pack! RRRRRRAAAAARRRR!!!!
Feeble Liche - come hence from mine fortress and kneel before thy Lord!
Drakenhof's stones are bound by mortar of mine own blood. While yours shall be sprayed across the battlefield as I wrench the head from thine shoulders!
At last! A chance to try a full out-flanking manoeuvre! A grand strategy wasted on the fleeing humans and these brainless Greenskin creatures...
Dese savages are gettin' in my way! They're led by som git called "Slagga". I want ‘iz ‘ead.
Shut it, Iron ‘at, I don't need your poncey tactics!
Shaddup, crown! Dis is not a waste of time! We kill ‘oo I say we kill!
Listen up, Boyz - they started callin' me "da Slaughterer". I like dat name, let'z not disappoint ‘em!
The plan's simple... I want a full pincer movement - attacking from the east and west flanks at the same time, will increase our chances of success…
I sed, shuddup! We'll go south later. I got some bizniss ‘ere first!
...Wot? Eh? Sodding dead bloke taking over my words again!
Get yer choppas out, ladz, it's time to move... And if ya want ta doo that flanking manoeuvre-wotsit, we probably should, cos I've got a feelin' it might work.
But I am no quarry! Let these bestial fleshlings come!
They will witness sand and stone, they shall see the true might of the Mortuary Cult; the true masters of Undeath, the Liches of Khemri!
The followers of Nagash have woven a web of deceit designed to entrap me, like a Tomb Scorpion waiting under the sands for prey…
You are fools to spurn me, grrrr… Are we not all Children of Chaos? Man-filth are the true enemy. Grrr… if you not follow the Crowfather, then the Crowfather will crush you too!

I have seen it, my herd-kin! The Dark Masters, show me the way… grrrr… tear down their walls, burn their churches… grrrr… defile this river with man-filth bodies! Grrr… please me - your Crowfather - and let the Dark Omen spread… GRRRRRR!
So, gird your loins, my kin. May your az be sharp and thirsty for urk blood, for they come.
We will repulse these vile creatures with our dying breath and renew the oldest and greatest alliance this world has ever seen!
Now is the time to test his mettle, we will stand with him against the grobi at Black Fire Pass as King Kurgan did long ago.

If the men of the Empire fight with bravery and honour then the runes of my crown will glow with pride ever after, a gesture of my will - just as this Emperor awaits to take up his Warhammer – a gift from the Dwarfs no less…

Once more we will ally with the Manlings, just as Grimnir did ten-score centuries ago! It has been many years since the umgi have produced an emperor as worthy as Magnus or their founding warrior-king, but… I hear good things about this Franz.
Sons of Sigmar, to me! Out there in that fen is a heretic, holding the Jade Griffon to his chest like the grubby thief he is!
To think that the talisman - a symbol of our Cult blessed by Magnus himself - is now in the clutches of this Necromancer and his Vampire consorts!
No! I say again, NO! Hunt down this filth, purge this place, and strike down any who dare to rise again - by the comet, that is my decree!

Now, Dawi, take up your axes, for the Undead will come to face us. They must, or I’ll have every tomb, every cursed gravesite, scoured from these lands, leaving these fell vampires with no puppets to command…

This fell deed has been entered into the Dammaz Kron and the cover slammed shut in rage! By my oath it shall not be opened until the grudge is settled, until the bones of the Undead are smashed to powder!
We come to Hel Fenn - this fetid realm - to extract vengeance! A great wrong has befallen our kin, innocent Clans-Dwarfs on a trade mission have been butchered by the Uzkular!
Come then, Zangunaz - raise your minions, march them forth for the High King of the Karaz Ankor would have his vengeance on you all!
This battle is no different. Get from my Vortex, Rat-scum, or face the wrath of the Witch King!
At last the power of the Vortex is within my grasp!
Ever since the reign of Caledor have I been denied this, and the vermin shall not deprive me now!
I have fought with gods before, and still live.
You are fools to spurn me.
If you not follow the Crowfather, then the Crowfather will crush you too!
Are we not all Children of Chaos? Man-filth are the true enemy.
No magic will save them! I'll hammer their Champion into a bloody meat patty before I eat him!
The Serpent-sluts over there challenge me because their master is scared - scared of me!
My twisted army, you all follow the Troll King! And you know that where the Troll King goes, death follows!
The Dammaz Kron, our Great Book of Grudges, is filled with such Greenskin atrocities! Bring hammer and axe - show these urks and grobi no mercy!
Fellow Dawi, I see Orc scum! They foul our mountains with their vile taint.
Saurus, to me; we will purge the world of Rat-spawn for eternity!
The Rat-spawn have crossed the world pond,
I failed Xhotl, but I will not fail here.
now their father-daemon crosses the cosmic barrier!
Are we going to let these urk trespassers get away with their sneaky shenanigans? Do we let them steal the treasure and valuables which belong to the Angrund Clan by right?
No! We do not! Let the grudge be settled - let vengeance begin! Yaaaarh!
The lost vault of Angrund is within reach!
First, wipe-out the Elf-things that guard the Vortex! Then let the real sacrifice begin!
Clan Mors victorious, with me-me at its head! Scurry-FIGHT-KILL!
I am no-no puppet of the Council. I am Queek!
Yes-yes, Sneek-scribe is correct; we shall be emissaries of the Horned Rat!
Let the insufferable Grey Seers become sacrifice!
Today we dispatch these faithless barbarians, these petty thieves, in tribute to Djaf, the God of War and Death.
He will feast as the jackal does and grow fat on their souls. For who dares stand before Settra in defiance of his will?
I am the King of Kings, the Imperishable. And I will see my crown returned!
Grab your blades, Druchii - there is no time for torment, just sever their lives - kill as many as you can!
This God of Rats is insignificant compared to the gods that have lusted for me!
It is time for these pests to be exterminated.
The Vortex is ours, none but my son shall walk into this maelstrom and only then will he with my permission.
These cattle are ignorant of what they now possess, but they will not live long enough to find out!
Roth’s Moondial cannot elude me any longer. It is only a matter of time before another rival uses it to gain access to the Galleon’s Graveyard.
The peons of the Empire dare lay their hands on the chest I seek!
Only I, Count Noctilus, am worthy of the Maelstrom’s boundless power!
Only I can rule the Great Ocean and the waters beyond!
Follow me loyal kin, now is our final fate - glory or defeat!
We cannot let Ulthuan be consumed in sea and shadow. We must stop this vermin-god at all costs.
And if it is not halted, the fate of all Asur will match Nagarythe.
The Loremaster speaks truth. There is a cancer at the heart of Ulthuan.
For these unfortunate souls shall not get a pass as I force them gaze into my looking glass!
Ahhhhhhhhhhhhh… whom do I spy, whom do I see? It is the glorious, doomed Knights of Chivalry.
Let me deal with the Bat, it has slain two creatures of Ulthuan and they must be avenged!
Steel yourselves, my kin, for now we fight not just to reclaim the War Crown for the honour of Saphery, but to vanquish the children of the Horned God.
They will come at us mercilessly, but know that every Skaven is a coward.
They are only emboldened in numbers, and so we must cut them down. The creatures that remain will become ever more craven!
Clan Rictus now-now most powerful, under Horned Rat I will be more than mere Chief of Deep Warrens, even better-superior title, yes-yes!
Forward rodents of Rictus: the Elf-thing island ours, Vortex OURS!
Scribe-slave squeaks wise words-noises!
*Meeker* (Let me just go and take a look-strategise from this vantage point far-far over here…)
Beyond this rabble is the tomb of a soul so great and so powerful that when it flows into this ancient chalice,  the power bestowed upon me will make the world tremble!
Soon I shall make them prostrate and subservient. In death, they will become servants to the von Carsteins, pliable and deliciously loyal.
Oh, these poor, fragile mortals… how they arrange themselves before me; proud and defiant.
Bring me what I am owed!
Bring me this colony, sisters, kill many - but make sure half are taken alive!
My son will learn that I am not a doll that can be cast aside when he tires of me!
Let them come to the shore, sally from their pristine walls, so I can smear them in Asur blood!
I shall take this sanctuary and from the souls within compose a song of screams and torment!
They were never part of the Old Ones’ plan - an accident of the cosmos - that must be rectified.
All need to be annihilated in time, but first start with these Vermin-spawn!
I will bring ruination to these warm-blooded Rat-abominations!
They stand trembling over there with their Champion, still trying to summon more help. Let’s make their corpses a bloody offering of our own!!!
Fellow raiders! Together we have destroyed realms, torn down the feeble cities of the weak, and proven ourselves worthy, worthy in the eyes of our Master.
Look at the Serpent-followers... those sensation-seekers and self-obsessed cowards!
We have the attention of the other Gods; they feel threatened by us! And what a dark blessing it is! It is proof of the Master's favour!
The Vortex must be saved. Prepare your souls, find the rage hidden deep within every Asur - unleash it
But know this, mighty Asur... We cannot let the Skaven bring their god onto blessed Ulthuan's shores.
I am not my brother, no warrior-general, no master of speeches.
and bring Aenarion's wrath upon the vermin!
As Sigmar fought, so shall we;  we will become part of the legend; We will wipe the Orcs from our door; And only when this is done - when our nation has healed - shall I take up Ghal Maraz!
For Sigmar, for the Empire, for the WARHAMMER!
Now is the time, Men of the Empire, to unite - for the Orcs gather. Beyond the pass, a Warboss draws to him all that is foul - an Orc horde beyond imagining!
Right, Boyz, dats da plan. Immortulz, get yer choppas out, dis one's gonna be fun!
Watch it though, just cos dere short doesn’t mean one or two of ‘em aint ‘andy with their own choppas. Dey like fighting underground… but so do we! Ask any rat-man under Mount Red Eye!
First, though, we need to break dem big gunz - dats just cheatin’! I want som boyz on dat straight away. Stop their artillery from shootin’ and we get more time scrappin’, just as Mork like’s it!
Time for a ruck, I say! I'm gonna enjoy pulling dese beards from dere chins.
Da Stunties come to stop us?! Hahahaha!
Ready your weapons, followers, we need to put down these Unliving servants of Marbad once and for all!
Now, come. Follow me, strike down the Undead that rise against us, allow me to find this eldritch amulet. I ask not for my own selfish studies but for the good of the Empire!
We could leave this mess for Todbringer to clear up, after all, this is his province, but, alas, Franz would not thank me.
This is the greatest reward, more than even gold for the fate of your soul is an eternal concern!
And yet we cannot retreat. The retainers of Marbad - once-ally of Sigmar and wielder of Ulfshard - stir in their tombs.

I will not lie, the chances of your survival are small - some may even turn against your friends as living corpses… But you have my word that I will use my arcane gifts to ensure your bodies are given unto Morr’s garden.
Curse the gods! This is the wrong location, I can already feel the absence of the Amulet.
Welcome to Estalia, gentlemen.
They will all die-die, I will be the new Arch-Plaguelord, Clan Pestilens will be the only-ultimate Great Clan!
Cleanse the hill of Elf-filth! Then ring the bell, bring forth our god. The age of Man-things… or Elf-thing… or Reptile-things is over-dead!
Let the Council send their minions to us-us, we have the favour of the Horned Rat!
Now is the time-time of the rat!
Put him in ground, let him feed worms! Now is the time of Khazrak!
They call me cunning, they call me the One-Eye - I call me Beastlord of all!
Graktar is lame. His time is over!
Fight for your souls! Fight for your homeland! Ulthuan is defended!
My brother tells me that the world is in peril - that is not our responsibility... but the Vortex is.
Sons and daughters of Ulthuan, be ready to fight!
If the world suffers so does Ulthuan, we cannot let the vermin bring their infernal god unto this Island!
Does he think his pathetic sorceries will work on me or my followers?

Come, my swords of Chaos, let us show this weakling conjurer who-would-be-royalty what I do to monarchs! He will see why I am the Lord of the End Times, why I am Everchosen, and why I will wield the Slayer of Kings!
Another thinks to bring me to my knees! Another who wishes me to bow before him, like he is some pitiless king!
The reptiles will seek to snare us. But we are the hunters - the trap is mine to spring - ensure it is executed.

I have refused the honour of wielding the blade of our forebears thus far. I was not worthy. But should we survive this day, should we drive the ruinous tribes back across the sea - then, with your blessing - I will pick up the Reikland Runefang and use it to bleed our foes - to carve my way through Sigmar's enemies!
But now… now I expect you to die for me.

The Celestial Wizards read the portents true. Norse Raiders land on Nordland’s shores. We have marched many miles, but there is no distance so great that I would not gladly march it to face this - our ultimate foe!
Those that thought to slay me, know that I hold no grudge, for betrayal is part of our way.
Hear me now, brave men - brave Reiklanders - hear me!
Begin the attack, return to me my Spellshield - ensure we are the hunters, not the prey!

Are you with me, Men of the Empire? For when the Northmen come, they will attack hard as their despicable gods demand. We must be ready to push them back, thrust them into the sea in defence of the Empire!
This is a dread task but my rewards will be great, for I can spin gold from lead, and as the Supreme Patriarch is there is a more powerful ally you can have?!
My arcane talents tell me this place is not unprotected, an ancient, once-dead guardian lies in wait. We must destroy it before we can collect the cave’s secrets. You will do this for me.
With me, followers - we will descend into Drake-Tooth Hollow, this cave of ill-aspect, for within lies an artefact of great power.
Begin your advance, banish the guardians of this place, and think of the rewards you will have once the Cloak of Molten Metal is mine!
What a pitiful age this is! It makes me pander for the era of worthy foes, such as Wilhelm, or that Wolf Knight, Kruger... not this pathetic squabble of mortal men.
Yet my sword thirsts and so it shall be slaked in the blood of living fools that think to challenge the might of von Carstein. Let the slaughter begin!
I have not seen such a pathetic sight since mine father-in-law, Otto, took his last breath! Is this all that thine Empire can muster?
Remember, dis is a cursed place, da Shamans don't like it, so no messin' wiv stuff ya don't understand. If ya summon something from da void - yoo ‘ll ‘ave ta deal with it yerself!
Alright, ladz. ‘Ere's da plan!

Once we killed everyfing, no one’z ta go lootin’ until I say so. Dis is my plan so I get da top picks. I’m in charge now, an' I need a shiny Boss-‘at! Anyone ‘oo disobeyz will get a boot up dere backside!
We goin' into dis lost city. But before we can rummage, we got to clear out all dem Undead things. Give ‘em a good kickin'!
Anyway! Let’s give Gork a show - get smashin! I want dis pass filled with blood!
Any 'oo fink they're gonna keep it instead, well... you'll find my boot so far up yer arse, you'll be tasting squig-leather until yoo die - which will be straight after!
I want da Humies to remember my name for yearz and yearz… remember GRIMGOR!!!
Raaaaargh! Dis iz it, Boyz! Time to give dis ‘Empera’ a right spankin’!
My axe, Gitsnik, is somewhere in dat pass. A bag of teef to the Orc dat finds it and 'ands it over.
Me and da Immortulz will lead from da front and seek out da poncey crown-wearin’ git ridin' 'iz big pigeon!
Asur to your queen! Defend the Vortex!
The torment of Caledor Dragontamer as he and his brothers wrestle to keep Ulthuan afloat.
We will aid them - salve their woes and stop this rat-god from entering the world!
I feel the pain of those within the Vortex.
These Chaos-lovin' umgi are in need of a reckoning, alright.
I have an oath to fulfil, so don't mind me if I'm greedy, but I need to kill lots of kruti braggarts to get my axe channelin' me runes.
Right, my northern kin, let's get about this.
I promised Grimnir they'd be a mighty tally and I ain't one for breaking such an oath. So come on! Let's have 'em!!!

See craven men! See them limp together like scared cattle… grr… They run no more; now is slaughter! Now we end lake hag's mongrels; now we end Sigmar's weak sons... grr... Kill for me, kill for dark masters, kill! That is why we were born! KILL!
I have spoken, that is my will - see it is done.
If you must die, then take as many of the enemy’s servants with you.
Your lives are nothing compared to this objective. Enforce my will - but do not sell your essence short.
Prepare to defend the Gate, it must not fall into the clutches of the enemy.
Black Fire Pass - it's all burnt, just 'ow I like my battlefieldz.
So listen to ya mate, Wurrzag - I'm da prophet and wot I sez goes! Let'z get 'em!
Gork want uz to fight da humies 'ere. Sez if we do dat and smack 'em about real good, den 'ee'll power up ma staff.
Press ESC to continue
How glorious!
It has been such fun watching the Empire and Bretonnians rip each other apart. Supplying me with fresh stock as they do - oh, the irony!
But while pulling their strings, working them like puppets has been immensely satisfying - it is now time for direct intervention.
Cease your squeaking and groom yourselves for battle, rodents of Clan Rictus, for the enemy come into sight!
This abbey, this altar of Taal is my desire, the Skull Staff within calls to me and I would have it.
Let the chittering hordes come and claim their Warpstone if they must, for me, the true prize is that wand of Dark Magic. With it, the legend of the Lichemaster will only grow!
Lucky-us, yes-yes! We attack while they are weak! We leave only their bones, ha-ha!
My legions advance! Bring me bone, bring me flesh, but do not bring me these things back alive!
The green no-furs sit upwind, unaware of our approach! Look-see how the block-headed fools send their patrols away! A-ha-ha!
Companions - Bretonnia's need is dire! This terrible fog corrodes our focus. Our enemy, a horde of horrifying beasts, thrives in this gloom, so be on your guard.
A head-on charge may not succeed - we must proceed more carefully. They are fast and deceptively cunning, but you are the Lady’s men, and no beast will stop you.
Should we fail today, Bretonnia will be left vulnerable. The kingdom relies on us; so fight to defend all you hold dear!
We search for Gromril ore. These Greenskins have it, slaughter them and find it for me!

And if the Dwarfs should think we carry out vengeance for their kin - then let them. I’d rather make allies of the bearded ones than enemies, they hold grudges and I have not the time or inclination for another enemy. There are greater, more pressing fates at work!
Now, bring me the heads of the Orcs, for I will have their skulls turned to gold, their eyes pierced with hot lead - they will truly know Searing Doom!
The seasons move ever on, and I feel the call to the Oak of Ages. Before I return to Ariel's embrace, another must be chosen to be born anew.
Though we challenge Anath Raema herself, the will of Kurnous must spurn her once more, and overcome these perverse desires!
Yet these traitors would sully the forest and bear a corrupt vision into being through their blackened hearts. These curs cannot be suffered to live.
Men of Reikland! Greenskins assault our capital. Theirs is a vile race Sigmar swore to expel from our lands, yet they dare return!
Join me, men - for I will not rest until every accursed Goblin lies burning on a pyre!
Um chuuka arrr, um chuuka arr, um chuuka ar Wurrzag Ud Ura Zahubu!
Right, dats Gork and Mork up-ta-date! And they're as miffed as me at dose gits stealin' my Squiggly Beast!
We gotta go and teach 'em a lesson; teach 'em not ta mess wiv Da Great Green Prophet! WAAAGH!
Arise Grave-bound! I command thee to attend!
Bring thy swords…Go, mine minions, reap death - dance a Danse Macabre!

Franz - the son of whores and tumorous Burgomeisters - thinks the crown is his! But the house of the Reikland Electors is tainted. As the last great count of Stirland, mine claim is the truest, I should be Emperor - I *will* be Emperor!
But I will take the murder of all the ratmen and the slaying of their Horned God.
He will forever be in my debt and such mundane power does not interest me.
Fine! Let Malekith have the Vortex!
That will be mine - and I dedicate it all to Khaine! Let the slaughter begin!
Since time out of mind, the Vampire thralls of my warped cousin have blighted Nehekhara.
Today, we burn out that blight. Hear me, O Asaph! This slaughter I offer in your name!
May your venom flow in the sacred staff, that I may shatter your adversaries for all eternity!
Better you had come yourself, Settra! The Staff of Nagash will be mine, and your servant's head will be returned on a spike! Haaah!
Perhaps he thinks me some princeling, to be swatted aside by such an inferior.
So, the "Great Settra" sends his champion to thwart my course, does he?
Vaul will deign to bless my sword; he will marvel at my creation - or I will destroy all of his!
Send forth the vanguard - have them prepare my way.
Let the king approach the god and have the god kneel!
Fools! Herds of Asur clog the path to Vaul’s petty shrine. Sweep them aside, my kin!
Dawi to me - there is no time for grand speeches.
Slayers! I see before me the Zangunaz and its filthy minions.
I want it stopped!
Slay everything that does not draw breath! And if some beast does get pulled back to life, then I relish meeting it in battle!
The Uzkular gather before that shrine, their evil masters in the midst of some Valaya-cursed ritual!
Even now the vampire stands there, chanting filthy umgi spells, trying to summon some abomination. It is time to fulfil your oaths made in Karak Kadrin!
Strike them down - bring me the heads of the craven things lurking in that shrine!
Now we move! Charge for the honour of all Kadrin! Charge for your King! Charge for the Slayer Crown! CHAAAARGE!
Look how the insects gather around the Arcane Fulcrum, chanting their pathetic rituals.
We shall slaughter them in its shadow, ensorcelling the Pillar of Bone with necromantic energy, and then mine blade will be bathed in unholy power!
It is time! The Dead March!
No is the answer!
They think to cage us in… but is the lion trapped when cornered by the rat? Do warriors squirm when confronted by weaklings?
Elves of Ulthuan to me! The scum of Naggaroth approach.
Gird your souls, let them come!
Today we must guard Lothern’s sea walls – let the Druchii torrent come!
But Ulthuan’s cliffs are strong! Its shores refuse to be washed away by the waves of our hated kin.
Fellow Asur, hear my words! Yet again the Druchii come at us - a never-ending a tide of war.
Begin the purge!
When the threat is eradicated I may contemplate the greater peril.
These warmbloods are aligned with the ancient enemy. They must be destroyed.
Their waves will break upon us! Turn back the flood! For Ulthuan, for the Phoenix King, for Asuryan!
Purge the city, my warriors, but ensure you leave some alive - I wish to know how loud a rat can scream.
I will not tolerate pests in Naggarond. The vermin will learn that my city, my realm, is a cold, cruel place.
Vermin dare infest my capital? Skavenblight over-exerts itself.
Why-why Gnawdwell, send Queek down to this backwater? To make fool of Queek, yes-yes?!
I not fail here – I make Clan Mors great in south, make Clanrats chirp my name! Make lands mine-mine!
Start by killing Elf-things! I want them dead-dead!
Go-go! Kill! Do not fail me-me!
I do this in the knowledge that those Orcs will soon be corpses scattering the battlefield.
Slayers - I hear your howls of longing, desperate to be about this, to plunge your axes into the Chaos scum before us. So, go - bring me victory, bring me death!

See how the Greenskin filth flock around that vile pillar! Let us wipe them out, so confident am I in these new machines that I forsake my axe, and will not take it up again until victory is secured here.
Let us be about this!
Behold! The stone-fruits of the Engineers' Guild's labour - new flying Gyro-machines will take to the air!

There… there, across the way… the discordance. For the Axe of Dargo to sing again, for the runes to glow bright with power once more, we must destroy the foe before us - the Chaos filth that dare cross our mountains!
Now let us test them against the eternal enemy - the ones who have more entries in the Great Book of Grudges than any other - the Orcs!
We do this in the name of Grimnir. For it will be a joy to spill the blood of Northmen.
Let me assure my traditionalist brethren within the Guild, that Morgrim himself would be pleased with this innovation.
The enemy Lord is a taint upon the world, yet in fighting him I shall make a thing of wondrous beauty. A perfect song of weaponcraft in whose rhythm the axe of my ancestor shall find harmony anew.
I need to fill my quiver, then the Moonbow can sing again – so let these Druchii mongrels come!
We shall show these followers of the weak-willed brat; the mummy’s boy that couldn’t even tame a candle flame in the shrine of Asuryan!
The Druchii scum seek to trap us. The fools think it is easy to snare the shadows! Disabuse them of this notion.

Not some weak minion sent by the Gods. No, what confronts me is something more corrupt, more bestial. It serves no master, seeks no glory other than its own! And that I applaud… even as I rip at its throats. For it must die. No man, no God… no creature, can challenge me and live!
At last! A worthy challenger comes!
